name: Horseradish Sauce, With Tarragon
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon fresh tarragon leaves, chopped (or 1 teaspoon dried)
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the horseradish, sour cream, mustard and tarragon leaves in a bowl. Mix thoroughly and add vinegar to taste. Season with salt and pepper.
Put the sauce in two small bowls.
